fields.label: Sections
fields.name: sections
fields.instructions:
Select your page sections to be displayed.
Take a look at the reference library here.

sub_fields.label: Paragraph
sub_fields.name: paragraph
sub_fields.default_value: We’re built around the belief that the bicycle is the world’s greatest, most utilized mode of transportation and that every individual, regardless of age, gender, race, or class has a right to afford, maintain, and enjoy one.

sub_fields.label: Highlight link?
sub_fields.name: highlight_link
sub_fields.instructions: Highlight this link in a different color?

sub_fields.label: Open link in new tab?
sub_fields.name: open_link_in_new_tab
sub_fields.instructions: Open this link in a new tab. Ideal for external links.

sub_fields.label: Headline
sub_fields.name: headline
sub_fields.default_value: Reno Bike Project is a nonprofit community bicycle shop and resource
sub_fields.placeholder: Reno Bike Project is a nonprofit community bicycle shop and resource

sub_fields.label: Paragraph
sub_fields.name: paragraph
sub_fields.default_value: Reno Bike Project (RBP) is a 501(c)(3) non-profit community bicycle shop and resource for the Truckee Meadows committed to creating a nationally recognized, cycling-friendly community through education, cooperation and advocacy.
sub_fields.placeholder: Reno Bike Project (RBP) is a 501(c)(3) non-profit community bicycle shop and resource for the Truckee Meadows committed to creating a nationally recognized, cycling-friendly community through education, cooperation and advocacy.
